text:
The Trascalando, or "People with the Thundering Hooves" in the [[Talentan]] tongue, are a [[centaur]] people native to the [[Talenta Plains]] in [[Khorvaire]]. They resemble a blend of humanoid and [[tribex]] rather than humanoid and horse. They sport bone
headplates and short horns, though these arenâ€™t strong
enough for an effective gore attack. 

The Trascalando are nomads who usually travel with herds of [[tribex]].
Though they prefer their isolation and usually have little
interest in the world beyond the [[Talenta Plains]], most
Trascalando bands are friendly toward the Talenta [[halfling]]s and have a long tradition of trade and storytelling. The [[Valenar]] incursions have disrupted this long peace,
and the Trascalando are deeply suspicious of [[elves|elf]].
title: Trascalando
